views.markdown:
This tweaks enables you to dismiss a popup everywhere. not notifications but popups. cancel button is removed

It works on ios 7,8,9 and 10

- This tweak is only tested on ios 10.2

No options to configure.

All apps are now supported Improved stability and delete bug fixed ios 9 @demy076 for tweak updates Added support for 2 apps

- Settings app supports now dismissing popups example forgot network click forgot or tap anywhere to dismiss it

- Messages app when on airplane mode try send a message you will get an alert tap anywhere on the screen to dismiss it

Contact me which app you want to add support for



- Dismissanywhere was conflicting with statuspeek 2 so your phone was going to safemode

Dismissanywhere will not conflict anymore with statuspeek 2


Added support for lockscreen when a uialert will popup in lockscreen you can dismiss anywhere on the lockscreen

- Hided the statusbar in notification center

Any ideas are welcome just contact me
